pullrequest.title: Modeling of simspark NAO robot and its Controller

content.raw: I checked those classes I think it has some bug in its addressing, I think you want a code that initializes the agent.I have created a base code which can be found in this [link](https://feupload.fe.up.pt/get/jAFSOuzXHvUqokg). Please see its readMe, In this version the agent does not have any specific behavior but I will merge the walk behavior to that code and release its code.
content.html: I checked those classes I think it has some bug in its addressing, I think you want a code that initializes the agent.I have created a base code which can be found in this link. Please see its readMe, In this version the agent does not have any specific behavior but I will merge the walk behavior to that code and release its code.
